name: World champion Table Tennis
description:
World champion Table Tennis is one of the most practiced sports in the world. Not only in China, where it has been declared the national sport, but in all countries around the world people play Ping Pong for fun or on a competitive level.
Features:
- 3D Ping Pong
- Table Tennis World Tour
- Realistic Ping Pong Physics
- One of the best sports games
- Choose your own country
- Become the Ping Pong Master
